name: BerlinFoodStories
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, what's in the news?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This skill contains a weekly update about the very best restaurants in Berlin and is dedicated to the people who are truly serious about great food and extraordinary dining. Berlin is an unique food destination with a complex culinary history, which has seen an unprecedented upswing in the last decade. Berlin Food Stories will lead you to all the best eats whilst providing an entertaining and 100% independent guide which will help you learn about the stories of the people behind these places. Berlin Food Stories Blog is written by Per and all the credits for the content go him: www.berlinfoodstories.com.
